channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin needs emptying, 7th February
item.description:
The bin is overflowing and hasn’t been emptied for some time. This bus stop and bin is used regularly by school children and commuters. Litter will be strewn on floor if not emptied.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Lane, Chislehurst, Greater London

item.title: Chester Gate Traffic Crossing on Albany Street, 7th February
item.description:
These works and the temp lights are the biggest mismanaged disaster in a quiet resident area in a protected conservation area environment. The lights temp in place are not working. This is causing enormous noise disturbance. Via traffic. Angry car drivers beeping horns 24/7. Cars ignoring and driving beyond red lights so clashing and not moving to let either pass. Language swearing and aggression. It’s utterly awful. This is a highly mismanaged project. I spoke to the engineers themselves and they said the lights have not worked since the start of the work placing them in the line of attack by horns and angry drivers. This places them in a dangerous working condition which breaches their own H and S, it places residents at danger as the aggression is massive of angry drivers. It’s not being managed. No one is assisting and acting on reports of issues. The police have seen due to massive car issue and tried to report.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-30, Robert Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins outside Richard 1st Pub blocking pavement, 7th February
item.description:
Reported last week and bins were removed for a couple of days but were back on Friday and unless the issue is addressed again they will simply increase in number again and remain a permanent eyesore and obstruction

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Royal Hill, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Albany street south opposite shops of Chester court temp lights, 7th February
item.description:
These temp lights are not working, they do not synch with the north side lights on Albany st or the Robert street lights onto Albany street. The traffic goes back up Albany. It’s awful. The horns and noise is disturbing the peace of a quiet conservation area. This is residential area. Police have seen and tried to contact.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-30, Robert Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Robert street onto Albany street temp traffic lights, 7th February
item.description:
Works are taking place on Albany street. Robert street has temp lights for cars driving onto Albany. This is a residential area. Access from flats parking onto Robert st. The lights are not working. They are not in synch. This is causing massive aggressive noise from cars beeping horns. Also traffic so traps residents parked in closed area that lead onto Robert street. It’s dangerous. It’s disturbing the peace of a conservation area. The police have seen and reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-30, Robert Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Albany St - Chester Gate Crossing Road Works, 7th February
item.description:
There is a massive traffic issue, causing chaos in a conservation protected area of Regent’s Park, a highly residential area. This is 24/7. The works being done has a 3 way traffic temp light systems. Ever since the work started the lights do not work. They signal wrong, They are not connected so synched, cars are beeping, people shouting, disturbing the peace in a protected conservation area. Cars are ignoring lights and coming to head in road and shouting. The police have seen last night, and reported, the pedestrian lights also make a loud noise that disturbs the peace in middle of night. This has been reported and no one is assisting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albany Street, Fitzrovia, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
